name: e2e-test-runner
description: End-to-end test runner for complete system testing

scripts.test: npm run allure:prepare && jest --testPathPattern='e2e' && npm run allure:append
scripts.allure:clean: rm -rf allure-results allure-report && mkdir -p allure-results allure-report
scripts.allure:prepare: rm -rf allure-results/history && cp -r allure-report/history allure-results/history 2>/dev/null || true
